short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: helpMe is a Chrome extension that utilizes the ChatGPT API to replace questions with answers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: helpMe - Chrome extension leverages the ChatGPT API to automatically scan webpages for questions and replace them with relevant answers. This allows users to obtain information quickly without having to read through lengthy paragraphs or manually search for answers. The feature provides accurate answers generated by ChatGPT, making browsing more efficient and convenient.
